    • Method Detail

      • setStrategy

        public void setStrategy(IViewManager viewManagerAdapter,
               IAdapter ballotAdapter)
                 throws UnknownStrategyException
        Call this method to set the strategy that this button group delegates to based on what is set in this button group's properties.
        Parameters:
        viewManagerAdapter - Often a strategy's constructor will need a reference to the view manager. Use this reference.
        Throws:
        UnknownStrategyException

      • select

        public void select(ToggleButton context)
        Toggle buttons should invoke this method when they want to select themselves. The group should delegate to its strategy here.
        Parameters:
        context - This is the button that would like to select itself.

      • deselect

        public void deselect(ToggleButton context,

        Toggle buttons should invoke this method when they want to deselect themselves. The group should delegate to its strategy here.
        Parameters:
        context - This is the button that would like to deselect itself.
